name: Baby Pictures
effect: Play this card during scoring. Choose a player. Move that player's Dinosaur meeple backwards 3 spaces on their Escape Route.

name: Crippling Shyness
effect: Play this card during scoring. The highest-scoring player at the end of the round may only collect up to 5 points.

name: Double Date
effect: Play this card during scoring. The advantages and disadvantages of all Dinosaur Traits are doubled.

name: One Week Anniversary
effect: Play this card during scoring. Swap the face-up Disaster card with a Disaster card in your Disaster Area.
